page.title: 03SEA BANK 2
page.content: As the salt is washed away the grass on the land gets greener. Whenever a tractor is ploughing the land on the marsh, there are no seagulls following the tractor because no worms live in marsh land because it is too salty.The digger machines digs up the soil and puts it into tubs which are taken up the bank and emptied. On the land they have reclaimed from the sea they grow things in this order. 1 year - grass and wheat. 2 year - sheep. 3 year - cattle. 4 year - potatoes. The boys from the Detention Centre do most of the work on the farmland.It is quite pleasant in summer but in winter it is very cold and the wind is always blowing.
